Text.Page:
I'm tired of us wringing our hands about the "poor" faeries and woodland creatures who've gone crazy! Once you kill my friends, you're no longer a woodland creature. You're a blight.

First on my hit list: {@LinkCreature:2#5#hulking sabertooths}. Let's make the Fey Forest safe for loggers once more!
I wish more soldiers were like you, taking the fight to the enemy.
